firstNightReminder: Show the Démone the in-play Demon character token.
name: Démone
ability: You start knowing which Demon is in-play. If there are 3 Demons in-play, good wins.

otherNightReminder: If the Minion was executed today: Wake a Townsfolk player, show THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU, the Minion token, and the Minion character ability they've gained. Show YOU ARE EVIL.
name: Minion
ability: If you are executed, a Townsfolk gains a not in-play Minion ability & changes alignment. [-1 Minion, -1 Outsider]

firstNightReminder: Show the Not-An-Outsider three true statements.
name: Not-An-Outsider
ability: You start knowing 3 true statements. 1 of them, if said publicly, will cause you to join the team that loses, even if you are dead.

firstNightReminder: The Evil points to two players. Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil players among them.
otherNightReminder: The Evil points to two players. Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil players among them.
name: Evil
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: learn how many are evil. You must choose new players each night.

otherNightReminder: Do whatever is needed to simulate the character A Character thinks they are.
name: A Character
ability: You think you are a good character not on this script, & might have their ability. Each night you might become a good character not on this script.

otherNightReminder: The Poisoned points to a living player. Either the Poisoned, or the chosen player, is poisoned. Show the Poisoned their chosen player's alignment.
name: Poisoned
ability: Each night*, choose an alive player: either you or they are poisoned til dusk. You learn their alignment.

name: Townsfolk
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn if you become a Townsfolk.

name: Storyteller
ability: Each day you may visit the Storyteller, & choose the outcome of the next "might" ability.

otherNightReminder: If the Hard Claim target died tonight, the game is over and good has won.
name: Hard Claiming
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a character, if that character dies tonight, good wins.

otherNightReminder: If the Outsider died tonight: Show the Outsider the Grimoire with all the tokens jumbled for a few seconds.
name: Outsider
ability: If the Demon kills you, the Storyteller will flash the Grimoire at you, but with characters out of order.

otherNightReminder: If Executed was executed today: Show that player 2 character tokens belonging to players that voted.
name: Executed
ability: If you are executed, tonight learn 2 characters of the players that voted today.

otherNightReminder: If the Not Dead died today: Show them a dead character's token. If they have been executed twice, they might resurrect.
name: Not Dead
ability: If you die, learn a dead character. If you are executed twice, you might be resurrected tonight.

name: Aiyamdrunk
ability: All other players are sober & healthy. If you are "mad" about your character, Townsfolk abilities yield false info, even if you are dead.

firstNightReminder: Publicly announce that a mistake has been made.
otherNightReminder: Publicly announce that a mistake has been made.
name: Not Good
ability: Once per game, the Storyteller will announce that a mistake has been made, but it shouldn't affect the game's outcome.

otherNightReminder: The Nominating Myself might die or resurrect.
name: Nominating Myself
ability: You might be resurrected at any time. You might die & might not die at any time.

name: One'ofthese'Three
ability: You might register as your living neighbors' characters, & as an evil Minion.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Mad and have them use the ability they think they have. It might work.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Mad and have them use the ability they think they have. It might work.
name: Mad
ability: You think you are a character not in this script, but you are not. Your ability might work, if your team is losing.

firstNightReminder: The New Player picks a player to drunk.
otherNightReminder: The New Player picks a player to drunk.
name: New Player
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are drunk tonight and tomorrow day.

name: Lying
ability: Players publicly 'mad' about being a character they are not might be executed. You register as Good. [+1 or -1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: Wake the Anything and use their newest ability.
name: Anything
ability: Each day you may visit the Storyteller to learn & gain a new ability, & lose the previous.

name: In-Play
ability: Once per game, you may publicly guess all players' characters. If all good player guesses are correct, your team wins.

otherNightReminder: The Impish points to a player. That player dies. Or, if that player was a "new player" and there are no other Impish in play: The Impish dies instead of the chosen player. The chosen player is now an evil Impish. Wake the new Impish. Show the YOU ARE card, then the Imp! token. Show YOU ARE EVIL.
name: Impish
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st "new player" this kills becomes an evil "Imp!" & you die instead.

otherNightReminder: If a Minion became the Regular Imp today: Show the YOU ARE card, then the Impish token. The Impish points to a player. That player might die.
name: Regular Imp
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they might die. The 1st time you die, a Minion becomes the Impish.

firstNightReminder: The Not An Imp Game points to a player. That player is poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The Not An Imp Game points to a player. That player is poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies.
name: Not An Imp Game
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously chosen player dies then becomes healthy.

otherNightReminder: The Imp! kills a player. If they chose themselves: replace an alive Minion with a Regular Imp token. Show them YOU ARE and then the Regular Imp token.
name: Imp!
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Regular Imp
